PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProtectiveDeviceTrippingUnitTypeResidualCurrent
PropertySetDef.Definition: Information on tripping units that are activated by residual current.

PropertyDef.Name: TrippingUnitReleaseCurrent
PropertyDef.Definition: The value of tripping or residual current for which the device has the possibility to be equipped. The values are given in mA.
